params._storageLocation: Information encoding the location of signed checkpoints

params._validators: The list of validators to get registrations for

returns._0: A list of registered storage metadata

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._hook: The address of the hook contract.

params._module: The address of the interchain security module contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

announce(address,string,bytes).notice: Announces a validator signature storage location

getAnnouncedStorageLocations(address[]).notice: Returns a list of all announced storage locations

getAnnouncedValidators().notice: Returns a list of validators that have made announcements

getAnnouncementDigest(string).notice: Returns the digest validators are expected to sign when signing announcements.

setHook(address).notice: Sets the address of the application's custom hook.

setInterchainSecurityModule(address).notice: Sets the address of the application's custom interchain security module.
